display_long_description:
Carbon Dream$ Land isn’t your average VR game – it’s a wild, satirical rollercoaster through the absurdities of the fossil-fuel era. Step into an over-the-top theme park where oil, coal, and gas are celebrated like it’s 1950. But there’s a catch: the show is run by Donnie Dino – a fire-breathing, gold-tie-wearing tyrannosaurus with an ego as big as his CO₂ footprint.

Together with up to three friends, you’ll dive into short, punchy missions (10–15 minutes) that mix fast-paced action with sharp climate satire. Your mission: blow up oil rigs, dodge diesel-powered drones, expose fossil-fuel propaganda, and turn scrap into shiny wind turbines. Armed with futuristic tools, quick reflexes, and the guidance of a rebellious scientist, you’ll fight through arenas packed with traps, explosions, and ridiculous characters.

Features:
- Cooperative VR action for 1–4 players on Meta Quest & Steam VR

- Short, replayable missions – perfect for quick sessions

- Unique gameplay mix of destruction and rebuilding

- A spectacular boss fight against Donnie Dino, the fossil-fuel showman

- A colorful, exaggerated world that’s as funny as it is fiery

The world’s on fire – so grab your friends, strap on your headset, and make fossil fuels NOT great again.
